channel.title: rk3328 on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in rk3328 on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: H96 Max+ Android box as a Linux server
item.description: The H96 Max + is an Android 8.1 box with a Rockchip 3328, 4Gb RAM and 32G or 64G builtin eMMC, it’s the same chipset as the Rock64, it costs around 60 USD. The only downside of this board is the 100Mb network link, can be a non issue using a USB network adapter. Serial Console Pins Baudrate 1500000 8N1 3.3V DTB You can extract the DTB from the image but I’m using rk3328-t9.
